name: List Scheduled Events for Guild

query.name: with_user_count?
query.description: include number of users subscribed to each event

description: Returns a list of guild scheduled event objects for the given guild.

params.name: channel_id? *
params.description: the channel id of the scheduled event.

params.name: entity_metadata?
params.description: the entity metadata of the scheduled event

params.name: name
params.description: the name of the scheduled event

params.name: privacy_level
params.description: the privacy level of the scheduled event

params.name: scheduled_start_time
params.description: the time to schedule the scheduled event

params.name: scheduled_end_time?
params.description: the time when the scheduled event is scheduled to end

params.name: description?
params.description: the description of the scheduled event

params.name: entity_type
params.description: the entity type of the scheduled event

params.name: image?
params.description: the cover image of the scheduled event

name: Get Guild Scheduled Event

query.name: with_user_count?
query.description: include number of users subscribed to this event

description: Get a guild scheduled event. Returns a guild scheduled event object on success.

params.name: channel_id? *
params.description: the channel id of the scheduled event, set to `null` if changing entity type to `EXTERNAL`

params.name: entity_metadata?
params.description: the entity metadata of the scheduled event

params.name: name?
params.description: the name of the scheduled event

params.name: privacy_level?
params.description: the privacy level of the scheduled event

params.name: scheduled_start_time?
params.description: the time to schedule the scheduled event

params.name: scheduled_end_time? *
params.description: the time when the scheduled event is scheduled to end

params.name: description?
params.description: the description of the scheduled event

params.name: entity_type? *
params.description: the entity type of the scheduled event

params.name: status?
params.description: the status of the scheduled event

params.name: image?
params.description: the cover image of the scheduled event

name: Delete Guild Scheduled Event
description: Delete a guild scheduled event. Returns a 204 on success.
